CROCHET  I  SKILL LEVEL: EASY
RHC0334-022512M  | LAST UPDATED: AUGUST 2019 TOOTH FAIRY DOLL | CROCHET    2 of 3
Row 22: Ch 1, sc in each sc across, turn.
Row 23: Ch 1, *sc in next 3 sc, 2 sc in next sc; repeat from * across, turn—30 sc.
Rows 24–41: Ch 1, sc in each sc across, turn.
Row 42: Ch 1, *sc in next 3 sc, sc2tog; repeat from * across, turn—24 sc.
Row 43: Ch 1, *sc in next 2 sc, sc2tog; repeat from * across, turn—18 sc. Fasten off.
BACK OF DOLL
Work same as front of doll, using A for head (Rows 1–18) and E for body (Rows 19–43).
Sew front to back, stuffing before sewing closed.
Headband
With E, ch 41.
Row 1: Sc in 2nd ch from hook and in each remaining ch across, turn—40 sc.
Rows 2–4: Ch 1, sc in each sc across, turn.
Row 5: Ch 1, working in front loops only, slip st in each sc across (for front edge of headband). Fasten off.
Ponytail Curls (Make 11)
With B, ch 12.
Row 1: Work 2 sc in 2nd ch from hook and in each remaining ch across—22 sc. Fasten off.
Curls for Bangs (Make 3)
With B, ch 7.
Row 1: Work 2 sc in 2nd ch from hook and in each remaining ch across—12 sc. Fasten off. 
Sew bangs, grouped together, on center front of head. 
Wrap headband around head, covering sewn ends of 
bangs, and sew in place. Sew ponytail curls, grouped together, on top of head.
Flower (for Headband)
With D, ch 5; join with slip st in first ch to form a ring.
Round 1: Work 12 sc in ring—12 sc. Do not join.
Round 2: Working in front loops only, (slip st, ch 1, hdc) in first sc, hdc in next sc, *ch 1, (slip st, ch 1, hdc) in next sc, hdc in next sc; repeat from * around—6 petals.
Round 3: Gently push petals forward and work in the unworked back loops of Round 1; (slip st, ch 1, dc) in back loop of first sc, dc in next back loop, *ch 1, (slip st, ch 1, dc) in next back loop, dc in next back loop; repeat from * around, slip st in first slip st. Fasten off.
Sew flower onto headband, at side of head.
Skirt Ruffle
With C, ch 60.
Row 1: Sc in 2nd ch from hook and in each remaining ch across, turn—59 sc.
Row 2 (Right Side): Ch 4 (counts as tr), working in front loops only, 2 tr in first sc, 3 tr in each remaining ch across—177 tr. Fasten off.
Skirt
With Right Side of skirt ruffle facing, join D with slip st in first unworked back loop of Row 1.
Row 1: Ch 4 (counts as tr), 2 tr in same back loop as join, working in remaining unworked back loops of skirt ruffle Row 1, 3 tr in each back loop across, turn—177 tr.
Rows 2–4: Ch 3, dc in each st across, turn.
Fasten off.
Leg (Make 2)
Beginning at foot, with A, ch 7.
Row 1: Sc in 2nd ch from hook, sc in next 4 ch, 3 sc in last ch; working across opposite side of foundation ch, sc in next 4 ch, 2 sc in last ch, turn—14 sc.
Rows 2–8: Ch 1, sc in each sc across, turn; change to E in last sc of Row 8.
Rows 9 and 10: With E, sc in each sc across, turn; change to D in last sc of Row 10.
Rows 11 and 12: With D, sc in each sc across, turn; change to E in last sc of Row 12.
Rows 13–28: Repeat Rows 9–12 four times.
Rows 29 and 30: Repeat Rows 9 and 10.
Fasten off. Sew side edges together to form tube. Stuff leg as you sew.
Toes
Join A with slip st to inner side (seamed side) of front of foot.
Row 1: Ch 1, 2 hdc in same space as join (big toe), work [slip st, ch 1, 2 sc (for toe)] 4 times evenly spaced across bottom of foot. Fasten off.
Sew top of legs closed and sew to bottom of body, placing leg seams to inside of leg.
Arm (Make 2)
Beginning at hand, with A, ch 2.
Row 1: Work 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook, turn—6 sc.
Row 2: Ch 1, *sc in next sc, 2 sc in next sc; repeat from * across, turn—9 sc.
Rows 3–17: Ch 1, sc in each sc across, turn; change to E in last sc of Row 17.
Row 18: With E, sc in each sc across, turn.
Row 19: Ch 1, 2 sc in each sc across, turn—18 sc.
Row 20 (Ruffle): Ch 1, *Slip st in next sc, ch 2, skip next sc; repeat from * across. Fasten off. Sew side edges together to form tube. Stuff arm as you sew. Fold Row 20 ruffle to outside of arm and sew arms to side of body.
Top Wing (Make 2)
With A, ch 10.
Row 1 (Right Side): Sc in 2nd ch from hook, sc in next ch, hdc in next 3 ch, dc in next 3 ch, 6 dc in last ch; working across opposite side of foundation ch, dc in next 3 ch, hdc in next 3 ch, sc in next 2 ch, turn—22 sts.
Row 2: Ch 1, sc in first 9 sts, 2 sc in each of next 4 sts, sc in last 9 sts, turn—26 sc.
Row 3: Ch 1, sc in first 11 sc, 2 hdc in next 4 sc, sc in last 11 sc, turn—30 sts. Fasten off A.
Row 4: With Right Side facing, join C with slip st in back loop of first st of Row 3, working in back loops only, *ch 2, skip next sc, slip st in next sc; repeat from * across to last sc, slip st in last sc. Fasten off.
Bottom Wing (Make 2)
Work same as top wing through Row 2. Fasten off A.
Row 3: Work Row 4 of top wing. Fasten off.
Sew wings in place on back of doll. Sew bottom wings first, then sew the top wings overlapping the bottom wings slightly.
Ear (Make 2)
With A, ch 2.
Row 1: Work 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook, turn.
Row 2 (Right Side): Ch 1, slip st in each sc across. Fasten off. Sew one pearl on each ear. Sew one ear to each side of head, in front of headband.
FINISHING
Weave in ends.
Embroider Face
With small amount of black pearl cotton, embroider French Knot eyes and straight stitch eyebrows. With small amount of red pearl cotton, embroider back stitch mouth. With red crayon, gently rub color onto face for cheeks. Place tooth necklace around neck.

materials: Red Heart® Amigurumi Prints™ (3.5 oz/100 g; 242 yds/221 m) Ladybug/Caterpillar (9029) 1 ball makes 2
Size U.S. B/1 (2.25 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
2 black safety eyes 1/4" [6 mm] for each toy.
abbreviations: Bobble = (Yoh and draw up a loop) 3 times all in next stitch. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 sc. Yoh and draw through all 3 loops on hook
measurements: Ladybug: Approx 4" [10 cm] long. Caterpillar: Approx 6" [15 cm] long.
instructions: Caterpillar: Multi Prints as Color 1 and White as Color 2. Ladybug: Red as Color 1 and Black as Color 2. Notes: • Join all rnds with sl st to /f_i  rst st. • To change color, work to last 2 loops on hook and draw new color through last 2 loops, then proceed in new color. CATERPILLAR Body With Color 1, ch 2. 1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 6 sc. 2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 12 sc. 3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sc. **4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sc. 5th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sc. 6th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 36 sc. 7th to 13th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. 14th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sts. 15th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sts. 16th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around.** Join with Color 2. Break Color 1. 18 sts. Rep from ** to **. Join with Color 1. Break Color 2. Rep from ** to **. Do not break Color 1. Secure safety eyes to Body as shown in photo. Stuﬀ   Body /f_i  rmly. Next rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 12 sts. Next rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 6 times. Join. 6 sts. Fasten off, leaving a long end. Draw end through rem sts. Pull tightly. Fasten securely. Antennae (make 2) With Color 2, ch 6. 1st row: Bobble in 3rd ch from hook. Ch 1. Fasten oﬀ  , leaving a long end for sewing. Sew Antennaes to Head as shown in photo. LADYBUG Body With Color 1, ch 2. 1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 6 sc. 2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 12 sc. 3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sc. 4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sc. 5th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sc. 6th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 36 sc. 7th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 5 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 42 sc. 8th rnd:  Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 6 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 48 sc. 9th to 12th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with Color 2 at end of last rnd. Break Color 1. 13th rnd: Ch 1. Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around. Join. 14th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 42 sts. 15th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 36 sts. 16th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sts. 17th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sts. 18th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sts. Stuﬀ   Body /f_i  rmly. 19th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 12 sts. 20th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 6 times. Join. 6 sts. Fasten off, leaving a long end. Draw end through rem sts. Pull tightly. Fasten securely. Head With Color 2, ch 2. 1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 6 sc. 2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 12 sc. 3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sc. 4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sc. 5th to 7th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. Fasten oﬀ  , leaving a long end for sewing. Secure safety eyes to Head as shown in photo. Stuff head /f_i  rmly. Sew to Body as shown in photo. See Diagram on page 3. Antennae (make 2) With Color 2, ch 6. 1st row: Bobble in 3rd ch from hook. Ch 1. Fasten oﬀ  , leaving a long end for sewing. Sew Antennae to Head as shown in photo. Using stem stitch, with Color 2, embroider line down back of Ladybug Body as shown in photo. See Diagram on page 3. Spots (make 6) With Color 2, ch 2. 1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 6 sc. Fasten oﬀ  , leaving a long end for sewing. Sew Spots to back of Ladybug Body as shown in photo. Stem Stitch

materials: RED HEART® “Eco-Cotton™ Blend”: 2 skeins 1372 Midnight Marl B; 1 skein 1370 Candy Marl C
RED HEART® “Bamboo Wool”: 1 skein each 3650 Dill D, 3365 Cocoa E, and 3265 Gold F
abbreviations: sc2tog: [Insert hook next st, yo, draw yarn through st] twice, yo, draw yarn through 3 loops on hook
gauge: With G-6 hook and A, 5 sts and 6 rows sc = 1”. With I-9 hook and D, E or F, 4 sts and 5 rows sc = 1” after felting. CHECK YOUR GAUGE. Use any size hook to obtain the gauge.
instructions:
BIRD

Body
With B, make an adjustable ring.
Round 1: 6 sc in ring—6 sc. Do not join rounds, work in a spiral, marking first st of each round, moving marker up as work progresses.
Round 2: 2 sc in each sc around—12 sc.
Round 3: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next sc] 6 times—18 sc.
Round 4: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next 5 sc] 3 times—21 sc.
Round 5: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next 6 sc] 3 times—24 sc.
Rounds 6-13: Sc in each sc around—24 sc.
Round 14: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts] twice, sc in next 9 sc, 2 sc in next 2 sc, sc in next 7 sc, sc2tog in next 2 sts—23 sc.
Round 15: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts] twice, sc in next 8 sc, 2 sc in next 3 sc, sc in next 8 sc—24 sc
Round 16: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 2 sc] 6 times—18 sc. Start stuffing body.
Round 17: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next sc] 6 times—12 sc.
Round 18: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts] around, slip st in next sc—6 sc. Fasten off, leaving a sewing length. Weave sewing length through sts of last round, gather tightly and secure.

Wing (make 2)
With B, make an adjustable ring.
Round 1: 6 sc in ring—6 sc. Do not join rounds, work in a spiral as before.
Round 2: 2 sc in each sc around—12 sc.
Round 3: (Hdc, dc, tr) in next sc, 3 sc along the side of the tr just made, [sc in next sc, 2 sc in next sc] 5 times, sc in last sc
Round 4: 2 sc in next sc, sc in next sc, 2 sc in next sc, slip st in next sc. Fasten off, leaving remaining sts unworked, and leaving a sewing length.

Beak
With F, make an adjustable ring.
Round 1: 4 sc in ring—4 sc. Do not join rounds, work in a spiral as before.
Round 2: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next sc] twice—6 sc.
Round 3: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next 2 sc] twice, slip st in next sc—8 sc. Fasten off, leaving a sewing length.

Tail
With C, ch 9. 
Row 1: Hdc in 2nd ch from hook, hdc in next ch, sc in next 5 ch, 4 sc in last sc, working across opposite side of foundation ch, sc in next 5 ch, hdc in next 2 ch, turn—18 sts.
Row 2: Ch 2 (counts as hdc here and throughout), working in back loops only, hdc in first 2 hdc, sc in next 6 sc, 2 sc in each of the next 2 sc, sc in next 6 sc, hdc in last 2 hdc, turn—21 sts.
Row 3: Ch 2, working in back loops only, hdc in first 2 hdc, sc in next 7 sc, 2 sc in each of the next 2 sc, sc in next 7 sc, hdc in last 2 hdc. Fasten off. Rounded end is base of tail.

ASSEMBLY
Sew bird together using matching yarn. With E, satin st 2 eyes on head. Weave in ends.

SMALL HEART (make 9)
First Half
With A, make adjustable ring.
Round 1: 6 sc in ring—6 sc. Do not join rounds, work in a spiral as before.
Round 2: 2 sc in each sc around—12 sc.
Round 3: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next sc] 6 times—18 sc.
Round 4-7: Sc in each sc around. Fasten off. 
Second Half
Repeat Rounds 1-7. Do not fasten off.
Bottom
Joining row: With right sides of first and second half facing, working through double thickness, with wrong side of second half facing, slip st in each of next 4 sc. 
Round 8: 2 sc in next sc, sc in next 12 sc, 2 sc in each of next 2 sc, sc in next 12 sc, 2 sc in last sc—32 sc.
Round 9: Sc in each sc around.
Round 10: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 6 sc] 4 times—28 sc.
Round 11: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 5 sc] 4 times—24 sc.
Round 12: Sc in each sc around. Start stuffing heart.
Round 13: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 4 sc] 4 times—20 sc.
Round 14: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 3 sc] 4 times—16 sc.
Round 15: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 2 sc] 4 times—12 sc.
Round 16: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next sc] 4 times—8 sc. Finish stuffing.
Round 17: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts] 4 times, slip st in next sc—4 sc. Fasten off, leaving a sewing length. Weave sewing length through sts of last round, gather tightly and secure. 

LARGE HEART (make 3)
First Half
With A, make adjustable ring
Round 1: 8 sc in ring—8 sc. Do not join rounds, work in a spiral as before.
Round 2: 2 sc in each sc around—16 sc.
Round 3: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next sc] 8 times—24 sc.
Round 4-8: Sc in each sc around. Fasten off. 
Second Half
Repeat Rounds 1-8. Do not fasten off.
Bottom
Joining row: With right sides of first and second half facing, working through double thickness, with wrong side of second half facing, slip st in each of next 4 sc. 
Round  9-11: Sc in each sc around—40 sc.
Round 12: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 8 sc] 4 times—36 sc.
Round 13: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 7 sc] 4 times—32 sc.
Round 14: Sc in each sc around.
Round 15: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 6 sc] 4 times—28 sc.
Round 16: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 5 sc] 4 times—24 sc.
Round 17: Sc in each sc around. Start stuffing heart.
Round 18: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 4 sc] 4 times—20 sc.
Round 19: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 3 sc] 4 times—16 sc.
Round 20: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next 2 sc] 4 times—12 sc.
Round 21: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts, sc in next sc] 4 times—8 sc. Finish stuffing.
Round 22: [Sc2tog in next 2 sts] around, slip st in next sc—4 sc. Fasten off, leaving a sewing length. Weave sewing length through sts of last round, gather tightly and secure. 

RING COVER
Join A with slip st around metal ring, ch 1, sc closely and evenly around ring, join with slip st in first sc. Fasten off. Weave in ends. With A, sew hearts to outside of ring and to each other at sides in the following order: *3 small hearts, 1 large heart; repeat from * twice. 

GLOBE COVER
NOTE: Some rounds are finished before the end of the previous round; some rounds are worked beyond the beginning of the previous round.

Half (make 2)
With A, make adjustable ring
Round 1: 8 sc in ring—8 sc. Do not join rounds, work in a spiral as before.
Round 2: 2 sc in each sc around—16 sc.
Round 3: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next sc] 8 times—24 sc.
Round 4: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next 2 sc] 8 times—32 sc.
Round 5: [2 sc in next sc, sc in next 3 sc] 8 times—40 sc.
Round 6: [Skip next 2 sc, 5 dc in next sc (shell), skip 2 sc, sc in next sc] 6 times, skip next 2 sc, 5 dc in next sc, leave last sc unworked—7 shells; 41 sts.
Round 7: Skip next 2 sts, [2 sc in next st, skip next 2 sts, 5 dc in next st (shell), skip next 2 sts] 6 times, 2 sc in next st—6 shells; 44 sts.
Round 8: [Skip next 2 sts, 6 dc in next st (shell), skip 2 sts, sc in next st] 8 times—8 shells; 56 sts.
Round 9: Ch 3 (counts as dc), 5 dc in first st (shell), skip next 2 sts, [2 sc in next st, skip next 2 sts, 6 dc in next st (shell), skip next 3 sts] 7 times, 2 sc in next st, slip st beginning ch-3—8 shells; 64 sts.
Round 10: Slip st in next 2 sts, [skip next 2 sts, 6 dc in next st (shell), skip next 2 sts, sc in next st] 10 times—10 shells; 70 sts.
Round 11: Skip next 2 sts of previous round [5 dc in next st (shell), skip next 2 sts, sc in next st, skip next 2 sts) 13 times—13 shells; 78 sts.
Round 12: Skip next 2 sts, 5 dc in next st (shell), [skip next 2 sts, sc in next st, skip next 2 sts, 5 dc in next st] 12 times—13 shells; 78 sts.
Round 13: Skip next 2 sts, [sc in next st, skip next 2 sts, 5 tr in next st (shell), skip next 2 sts] 12 times, sc in next st—12 shells; 72 sts.
Round 14: Skip next 2 sts, [5 tr in next st (shell), skip next 2 sts, sc in next st, skip next 2 sts)]12 times—12 shells; 72 sts.
Round 15: [5 tr in next st, skip next 2 sts, sc in next st, skip next 2 sts] 12 times, slip st in next st.  
NOTE: Place globe halves on Styrofoam® ball. If there is a gap between the 2 halves, continue to round 16. If there is no gap, fasten off leaving a sewing length and continue to assembly.
Round 16 (optional): Ch 2, hdc in each st around, join with slip st in beginning ch-2. Rep round 16 as many times as necessary to fill gap between 2 halves. Fasten off, leaving a long sewing length.

ASSEMBLY
With sewing length, sew globe halves together over ball. Weave in ends.

CONTINENTS
Square (make 1 each using D, E and F)
With I-9 hook, make a 10” long ch.
Row 1: Sc in 2nd ch from hook, sc in each ch across, turn.
Row 2: Ch 1, sc in each sc across, turn.
Rep row 2 until square measures 10” deep. Fasten off. 

FELTING
Place 10” squares in mesh sweater bag or pillowcase and close. Using hottest possible water and approximately 2 tablespoons liquid hand soap, fill washer 1/3 full. Place squares in washer with an old pair of jeans (for agitation).  
Agitate for 6 minutes. Check the felting progress every minute after 6 minutes; depending on your washer, it will take 6-8 minutes of agitation to felt the desired amount. 
When you’re pleased with the amount of felting, and felted gauge is achieved, remove the squares and drain wash water from machine; gently squeeze water from squares. 
Fill washer to the same water level with cold water. Place squares into washer and rinse/agitate for another minute – the cold water will make the squares felt just a bit more.
Set machine to drain, then run spin cycle for approximately 30 seconds (creases caused by over spinning are difficult to remove from the finished piece). Remove squares, gently stretching into shape, if needed. Drying process may take up to 2 days, depending on humidity in the air.

FINISHING
Trace pattern pieces and cut out. Using pattern pieces, cut out North America and Asia from D square; cut Africa and Australia from E square; and cut Europe and South America from F. With hot glue, glue continents to globe in proper position. Cut a 28” length of fishing line. Thread fishing line onto yarn needle, insert needle ½” from center top of globe cover, exit 1” away on opposite side of center. Draw fishing line through and bring ends together. Using yarn needle, draw 2 ends of fishing line through bird, from center bottom to center top of body. With fishing line measuring approximately 9” from bird to globe, tie ends of line in several overhand knots at top of bird to secure. Cut four 22” lengths of fishing line. Tie one length of fishing line to each side of ring, equally spaces around. With yarn needle, draw 4 lengths of fishing line through bird, from center bottom to center top of body. Adjust lengths of fishing line to place ring, slightly tilted, around center of globe. Tie 4 ends of fishing line in an overhand knot at top of bird to secure. With all 6 strands of fishing line at top of bird, tie in an overhand knot approximately 2” from top of bird to make hanging loop. Cut off excess fishing line.

materials: Lily® Sugar ’n Cream (70.9 g/2.5 oz; 109 m/120 yds)
Size 3.5 mm (U.S. E or 4) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Small amount of red yarn for embroidery of mouth.
instructions:
HEAD
**With A, ch 2.
1st rnd:6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd and 3rd rnds: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 24 sc at end of 3rd rnd.**
4th rnd:Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Rep last rnd 7 times more.
Next rnd:*1 sc in next sc. Draw up a loop in each of next 2 sts. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook–Sc2tog made. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sts. Stuff Head.
Next rnd:Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Next rnd:Ch 1. *Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first st. 8 sc.
Fasten off leaving a long end. Draw end tightly through rem sts.
BODY
With B, ch 12. Join with sl st to first ch.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each ch around. Join with sl st to first sc. 
2nd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 18 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 24 sc.
5th rnd: As 3rd rnd.
6th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 30 sc.
7th to 10th rnds: As 3rd rnd. Join C at end of 10th rnd. Do not break B.
11th rnd: With C, working in front loops only, ch 3 (counts as dc). 1 dc in same sp as last sl st. *2 dc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to top of ch 3.
12th rnd: With B, working in unused loops of rnd before last, ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 30 sc.
13th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 20 sts.
Stuff Body.
14th rnd: Ch 1. *Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first st. 10 sts.
15th rnd: As 14th rnd. 5 sts. Fasten off, leaving a long end. Draw end tightly through rem sts.
HAIR
With D, work from ** to ** as given for Head.
Next rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Next rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of next 17 sc. (Sl st. Ch 5. Sl st) in each of next 7 sc. Join with sl st to first sc.
Beg working in rows:
Next row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of next 17 sc. Turn.
Leave rem sts unworked.
Next row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep last row 4 times more.
Next row: Ch 3 (counts as dc). 2 dc in first sc. *Sl st in next sc. 3 dc in next sc. Rep from * to end of row.
Fasten off.
GARLAND OF FLOWERS
With B, ch 5. (Sl st. Ch 5) 3 times in 5th ch from hook. Sl st in same sp. *Ch 10. (Sl st. Ch 5) 3 times in 5th ch from hook. Sl st in same sp. Rep from * 3 times more.
Ch 5. Fasten off. Sew ends of Garland tog. Sew into place on top of Hair.
Sew Hair onto top of Head.
ARMS(make 2).
With A, ch 2.
1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
3rd rnd: As 2nd rnd. Join B with sl st to first sc.
4th rnd: With B, as 2nd rnd.
Rep last rnd 5 times more. Fasten off.
LEGS (make 2).
Shoe: With C, ch 5.
1st rnd: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 3 sc in last ch. Do not turn. Working in rem loops of foundation ch, 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 2 sc in last ch. Join with sl st to first sc. 10 sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in each of next 3 sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in each of last 2 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 
4th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. (Sc2tog) 3 times. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Join A with sl st to first sc. 12 sts.
6th rnd: With A, ch 1. Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. (Sc2tog) 3 times. 1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 8 sts. 
7th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc. 
Rep last rnd once more. Fasten off.
FLOWER
Stem: With B, ch 9. Sl st in 2nd ch from hook. Sl st in each of next 2 chs. Ch 6. Sl st in same sp as last sl st. Sl st in each ch to end of ch. Fasten off.
Flower: With E, *Ch 6. Sl st in 6th ch from hook. Rep from * 4 times more. Fasten off.
Attach Flower to Stem.
FINISHING
Stuff Arms and Legs lightly. With red yarn, embroider mouth. Attach beads for eyes. Attach Arms to either side of Body and sew Flower to Hands as shown in picture. Sew Legs to Body as shown in picture.

materials: Bernat® Blanket™ (10.5 oz/300 g; 220 yds/201 m)
Contrast A Dark Teal (10825) 1 ball or 132 yds/121 m
Contrast B Misty Green (10878) 1 ball or 26 yds/24 m
Contrast C Vintage White (10006) 1 ball or 9 yds/8.5 m
Size U.S. L/11 (8 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
2 black safety eyes 1" [2.5 cm]. Stuffing. Yarn needle.
abbreviations: Sc2(3)tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2(3) sc. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook
instructions:
Note: Join all rnds with sl st to first st.
Body
With A, ch 2.
1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 6 sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 12 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sc.
6th to 11th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
12th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 36 sc.
13th and 14th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
15th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 5 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 42 sc.
16th to 22th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
23rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 36 sts.
24th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sts.
25th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sts.
26th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sts.
Secure safety eyes to Body as shown in photo. Stuff Body firmly.
27th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 12 sts.
28th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 6 times. Join. 6 sts. Fasten off, leaving a long end. Draw end through rem sts. Pull tightly. Fasten securely.
Nose
With A, ch 4.
1st rnd: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in next ch. 3 sc in last ch. Working into opposite side of foundation ch, 1 sc in next ch. 2 sc in last ch. Join. 8 sc.
2nd and 3rd rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. Fasten off at end of 3rd row. Stuff Nose. Sew to Body as shown in picture.
Embroider Nostrils with straight stitch as shown in picture. See page 3.
Ears (make 2)
With B, ch 3, leaving a long end for sewing.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in next ch. Turn. 2 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in each of next 2 sc. Turn. 4 sc.
3rd row: Ch 2. Sl st in each of rst 2 sc. Ch 2. Sl st in each of next 2 sc. Ch 2. Sl st in same sp as last sl st. Fasten off. Sew Ears to Body as shown in photo.
Horns (make 2)
With C, ch 4, leaving a long end for sewing. Join with sl st to first ch.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each ch around. Join. 4 sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) twice. Join. 2 sts. Fasten off. Draw end through rem sts. Pull tightly. Fasten securely.
Stuff Horns firmly. Sew Horns to Body as shown in photo.
Arms (make 2)
With A, ch 2.
1st rnd: 4 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 4 sc.
2nd to 6th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. Fasten off at end of last rnd, leaving a long end for sewing.
Sew Arms to Body as shown in photo.
Belly
With B, ch 4.
1st rnd: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in next ch. 3 sc in next ch. Working into opposite side of foundation ch, 1 sc in next ch. 2 sc in last ch. Join. 8 sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in each of next 3 sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in each of last 2 sc. Join. 14 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in first sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) 3 times. 1 sc in next sc. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) twice. Join. 20 sc. Fasten off, leaving a long end for sewing.
Sew Belly to Body as shown in photo.
Tail
With A, ch 18, leaving a long end for sewing. Join with sl st to first ch.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each ch around. Join. 18 sc.
2nd and 3rd rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 15 sts.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
6th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 12 sts.
7th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
8th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 9 sts.
9th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
10th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 6 sts.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
12th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 3 times. Join. 3 sts. Fasten off, leaving a long end. Draw end through rem sts. Pull tightly. Fasten securely. Stuff Tail firmly. Sew Tail to Body as shown in photo.
Spikes (make 4)
With C, ch 4, leaving a long end for sewing.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 3 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. Sc3tog. Fasten off. Sew Spikes to Body and Tail as shown in photo.
Wings (make 2)
With B, ch 2.
1st row: 2 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Turn. 2 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in each of next 2 sc. Turn. 4 sc.
3rd row: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * once more. Turn. 6 sc.
4th row: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * once more. Turn. 8 sc.
5th row: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * once more. Turn. 10 sc.
6th row: *Ch 2. Sl st in next sc. Rep from * to end of row. Join A. Do not turn. Break B.
Wing edging: 1st row: With A, ch 1. Working down straight edge of Wing, work 6 sc evenly across.
Fasten off, leaving a long end for sewing. Sew Wings to Body as shown in photo.
Eyelids (make 2)
With A, ch 2.
1st row: 3 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Turn. 3 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc to end of row. Do not turn. 6 sc.
Cont across straight edge, work 4 sc evenly across edge.
Fasten off.
Sew Eyelids to face as shown in photos, covering half of each eye.
STRAIGHT STITCH

materials: Bernat® Baby Velvet™ (10.5 oz/300 g; 492 yds/450 m) Misty Gray (86016) 1 ball or 492 yds/450 m
Size U.S. D/3 (3.25 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Small amount of Black worsted weight yarn for embroidery.
abbreviations: Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
measurements: Approx 10" x [25.5 cm] tall x 9" [23 cm] diameter, excluding feet and ears.
instructions:
Note: Stuffie is worked in a continuous spiral. Do not join at end of rnds. Place marker on first stitch of rnd and move marker each rnd to keep place.

BODY
Ch 2.
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook, placing marker on first st for beg of rnd. Do not join. 8 sc.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in each sc around. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
4th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 32 sc.
5th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 40 sc.
6th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 48 sc.
7th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 56 sc.
8th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 64 sc.

9th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Rep from * around. 72 sc.
10th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
11th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. 80 sc.
12th rnd: *2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 9 sc. Rep from * around. 88 sc.
13th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
14th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 5 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 96 sc.
15th rnd: *2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 11 sc. Rep from * around. 104 sc.
16th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
17th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 6 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Rep from * around. 112 sc.
18th rnd: *2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 13 sc. Rep from * around. 120 sc.
19th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
Place 2nd marker at end of rnd – do not move 2nd marker each rnd. Rep last rnd until work from 2nd marker measures 4" [10 cm].

Shape top: 1st rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 13 sc. Rep from * around. 112 sts.
2nd to 4th rnds: 1 sc in each st around.
5th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Rep from * around. 104 sts.
6th to 8th rnds:  1 sc in each st around.
9th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 11 sc. Rep from * around. 96 sts.
10th and 11th rnds: 1 sc in each st around.
12th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. Rep from * around. 88 sts.
13th rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
14th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 9 sc. Rep from * around. 80 sts.
15th rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
16th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. 72 sts.
17th rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
18th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Rep from * around. 64 sts.
19th rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
20th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 56 sts.
21st rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
22nd rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 48 sts.
23rd rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
24th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 40 sts.

Stuff Body and Head.
25th rnd: 1 sc in each st around.
26th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 32 sts.
27th rnd: *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sts.
28th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 16 sts.
29th rnd: *Sc2tog. Rep from * around. 8 sts. Fasten off leaving a long end. Thread end through rem sts and fasten securely.

EARS (make 4)
Ch 11.
1st row: 2 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to last ch. 2 sc in last ch. 12 sc. Turn.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
3rd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. 14 sc. Turn.
4th row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
5th to 8th rows: As 3rd and 4th rows twice more. 18 sc.
9th row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. 19 sc. Turn.
10th row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row.
11th and 12th rows: As 9th and 10th rows once more. 20 sc. Turn.
13th to 16th rows: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 12 sc at end of last row.
Place marker on last st to mark top of Ear.
Fasten off.

Join Left Ear: Place 2 Ears together with top markers aligned at left side. Join yarn with sl st to bottom right corner. Ch 1. Working through both thicknesses, work 1 row of sc up right side of Ear, across last row and down left side of Ear. Fasten off leaving a long end.

Join Right Ear: Place 2 Ears together with top markers aligned at right side. Join yarn with sl st to bottom right corner. Ch 1. Working through both thicknesses, work 1 row of sc up right side of Ear, across last row and down left side of Ear. Fasten off leaving a long end.

TRUNK
Ch 2.
Working in spiral as for Body, proceed as follows:
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in each sc around. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around.
4th to 7th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
8th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 20 sc.
9th to 16 rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
17th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
18th to 25th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
26th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 28 sc.
27th and 28th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
Fasten off. Stuff Trunk lightly.

FEET (Make 4).
Ch 2.
Working in spiral as for Body, proceed as follows:
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Place marker on last st for beg of rnd. 8 sc.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in each sc around. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
4th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 32 sc.
5th rnd: Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around.
6th and 7th rnds: Working in both loops, 1 sc in each sc around.
8th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 24 sts.
9th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
10th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 16 sts.
11th rnd: Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each st around.
12th to 15th rnds: Working in both loops, 1 sc in each sc around.
Fasten off. Stuff Feet lightly.

TAIL
Ch 2.
Working in spiral as for Body, proceed as follows:
1st rnd: 4 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 4 sc.
2nd and 3rd rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
4th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 6 sc.
5th and 6th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
7th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 8 sc.
8th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
9th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 10 sc.
10th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
11th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. 12 sc.
12th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
Fasten off. Stuff Tail lightly.

FINISHING
Fold down top of Right Ear ½" [1 cm] at foundation chain and sew to Body as seen in picture. Rep for Left Ear. Sew Trunk, Feet and Tail to Body as seen in photo. Bend Trunk to desired shape and tack in place with MC. With black worsted weight yarn, embroider eyes using Satin Stitch. With black worsted weight yarn, embroider eyebrows and mouth using Stem Stitch.

materials: RED HEART® “Super Saver®”: 1 skein each 334 Buff A, 365 Coffee B, and 316 Soft White C.
Stuffing, split-ring stitch marker, yarn needle.
abbreviations: * or ** = repeat whatever follows the * or ** as indicated
[ ] = work directions in brackets the number of times specified
measurements: Chocolate Pie & Ice Cream is 8”. Pie is 4½” from point to back of crust. Ice Cream long.
gauge: 13 sc = 4”; 16 rows = 4”. CHECK YOUR GAUGE. Use any size hook to obtain the gauge.
instructions:
CHOCOLATE PIE
Crust
With A, ch 2.
Row 1: 3 sc in 2nd ch from hook; turn – 3 sts.
Row 2: Ch 1, sc in each st across; turn.
Row 3: Ch 1, 2 sc in 1st st, sc to last st, 2 sc in last st; turn – 5 sts.
Rows 4-15: Repeat Rows 2-3 – 17 sts at end of Row 15.
Row 16: Repeat Row 2.
Row 17: Ch 1, working in back loops ONLY, sc in each st across; turn.
Rows 18-21: Repeat Row 2.
Row 22: Ch 1, (sc, dc, sc) all in 1st st; * slip st in next st, (sc, dc, sc) all in next st; repeat from * across. Fasten off.
Chocolate
With B, work same as Crust through Row 16.
Row 17: Ch 1, sc in each st across; DO NOT TURN; work 16 sc evenly along edge, 1 sc in tip, 16 sc evenly along other edge; turn – 50 sts.
Row 18: Ch 1, working in front loops ONLY, sc in 1st 33 sts; TURN.
Row 19: Working in these 33 sts only, ch 1, sc in each st across; turn.
Rows 20-21: Repeat Row 19. Fasten off.
Join: Hold Chocolate in place on Crust and attach A in top back left corner of Crust. Ch 1, work through both Chocolate and Crust, sc evenly down side, across bottom edge, and up other side. Fasten off. Stuff pie and with A, sew opening closed.
Whipped Cream
With C, ch 30.
Row 1: 3 dc in 3rd ch from hook and in next 14 ch, 3 tr in remaining ch across. Fasten off.
Curl Whipped Cream according to photo and sew to top of Pie.

ICE CREAM CONE
Cone
With A, ch 2.
Round 1: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook.
Round 2: * Sc in next 2 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 8 sts.
Round 3: * Sc in next 3 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 10 sts.
Round 4: * Sc in next 4 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 12 sts.
Round 5: * Sc in next 5 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 14 sts.
Round 6: * Sc in next 6 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 16 sts.
Round 7: * Sc in next 7 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 18 sts.
Round 8: * Sc in next 8 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 20 sts.
Round 9: * Sc in next 9 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 22 sts.
Round 10: Sc in each st around.
Round 11: * Sc in next 10 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 24 sts.
Round 12: Repeat Round 10.
Round 13: * Sc in next 11 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 26 sts.
Round 14: Repeat Round 10.
Round 15: * Sc in next 12 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 28 sts.
Round 16: Repeat Round 10.
Round 17: * Sc in next 13 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 30 sts.
Round 18: Repeat Round 10. Fasten off.
Ice Cream
With C, ch 2.
Row 1: Sc in 2nd ch from hook; turn – 1 st.
Row 2: Ch 1, sc in st; turn.
Row 3: Ch 1, 2 sc in st; turn – 2 sts.
Row 4: Ch 1, sc in each st across; turn.
Row 5: Ch 1, sc in 1st st, 2 sc in next st; turn – 3 sts.
Row 6: Repeat Row 4.
Row 7: Ch 1, sc in 1st st, 2 sc in next st, sc in next st; turn – 4 sts.
Row 8: Ch 1, sc in 1st st, 2 sc in next st, sc in remaining sts; turn – 5 sts.
Row 9: Ch 1, sc in 1st 2 sts, 2 sc in next st, sc in remaining sts; join with a slip st to first sc to form ring, begin working in rounds – 6 sts.
Round 10: * 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 12 sts.
Round 11: * Sc in next st, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 18 sts.
Round 12: * Sc in next 2 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 24 sts.
Round 13: Sc in each st around.
Round 14: * Sc in next 3 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 30 sts.
Round 15: * Sc in next 4 sts, 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 36 sts.
Round 16: Repeat Round 13.
Round 17: * Sc2tog; repeat from * around – 18 sts.
Round 18: Repeat Round 13.
Round 19: * 2 sc in next st; repeat from * around – 36 sts.
Rounds 20-23: Repeat Round 13.
Round 24: * Sc in next 4 sc, sc2tog; repeat from * around – 30 sts. Fasten off.
Join: Stuff Cone and Ice Cream. With A, sew together. Sew Rows 1-9 of Ice Cream together lengthwise, curl down and sew in place.
Cuff
With A, ch 5.
Row 1: Sc in 2nd ch from hook and in each ch across; turn – 4 sts.
Rows 2-28: Ch 1, working in back loops ONLY, sc in each st across; turn.
Fasten off. Sew in place around top of Cone.
Weave in ends.

materials: Caron® Simply Soft™ (Solids: 6 oz/170.1 g; 315 yds/288 m; Heathers: 5 oz/141.7 g; 250 yds/228 m)
Bernat® Pipsqueak™ (3.5 oz/100 g; 101 yds/92 m)
Sizes U.S. E/4 (3.5 mm) and U.S. I/9 (5.5 mm) crochet hooks or sizes needed to obtain gauge.
Pair of 10 mm Safety Eyes or 2 buttons for Eyes.
abbreviations: Hdc2tog = Yoh and draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook
Sc2(3)tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2(3) stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
gauge: Caron® Simply Soft™: 17 sc and 18 rows = 4" [10 cm] with smaller hook. Bernat® Pipsqueak™: 9 sc and 12 rows = 4" [10 cm] with larger hook.
instructions:
Body
With A and smaller hook, ch 2.
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in next sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 24 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 32 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 40 sc.
6th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 48 sc.
7th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 56 sc.
8th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 64 sc.
9th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first sc. 72 sc. Place marker on last rnd.
10th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Rep last rnd until work from marked rnd measures 5" [12.5 cm].
Beg dec rnds: 1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 7 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 64 sts.
2nd to 5th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc.
6th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 6 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 56 sts.
7th to 10th rnds: As 2nd to 5th rnds.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 5 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 48 sts.
12th to 15th rnds: As 2nd to 5th rnds.
16th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 4 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 40 sts.
17th to 20th rnds: As 2nd to 5th rnds.
21st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 3 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 32 sts.
22nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten off.
Stuff Body.
Head
Nose: With B and smaller hook, ch 2.
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sc.
3rd and 4th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join A with sl st to first sc.
5th and 6th rnds: With A, ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
7th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 32 sc.
8th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
9th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 3 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 40 sc.
10th rnd: As 8th rnd.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 4 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 48 sc.
12th rnd: As 8th rnd.
Cont as established, inc 8 sc evenly spaced across every other rnd to 64 sc.
Next rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Rep last rnd 7 times more.
Beg dec rnds: 1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 6 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 56 sts.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 5 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 48 sts
4th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 4 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 40 sts.
6th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
7th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 6 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 35 sts.
8th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
Stuff Head.
9th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 3 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 28 sts.
10th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 2 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 21 sts.
12th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
13th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in first sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 14 sts.
14th rnd: Ch 1. *Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to first st. 7 sts.
Fasten off, leaving a long end. Draw end through rem loops and pull tightly. Fasten securely.
Sew Head to top of Body.
Fuzzy Beard
With D and larger hook, ch 5.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 4 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn. 8 sc.
3rd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last sc. 1 sc in last sc. 12 sc.
4th row: As 3rd row. 18 sc.
5th row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. 1 sc in each of last 2 sc. 24 sc.
6th row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last 3 sc. 1 sc in each of last 3 sc. 30 sc.
7th row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last 4 sc. 1 sc in each of last 4 sc. 36 sc.
Cont as established, inc 6 sc evenly spaced on each of next 4 rows. 60 sc at end of 11th row. Fasten off.
Curve Beard around bottom of Nose, and up sides of Face to create Beard shape as shown in picture. Attach Safety Eyes or buttons to part of Beard that curves upwards. Sew in position. With B, embroider mouth.
Outer Ear (make 2)
With smaller hook and A, ch 11.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Turn. 10 sc.
2nd to 7th rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
8th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 8 sts.
9th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 6 sts.
10th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 4 sts.
11th row: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) twice. Turn. 2 sts.
12th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. Fasten off.
Inner Ear (make 2)
With smaller hook and D, ch 9.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Turn. 8 sc.
2nd and 3rd rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
4th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 6 sts.
5th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 4 sts.
6th row: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) twice. Turn. 2 sts.
7th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. Fasten off.
Holding WS of Outer and Inner Ears tog, with larger hook and 2 strands of A held tog, join with sl st to bottom right corner. Working through both thicknesses, Ch 1. Work 1 row of sc evenly to tip of Ear. Work 3 sc in tip of Ear. Work 1 row of sc evenly along left side edge. Fasten off.
Sew Ears to top of Head.
Arms (make 2)
With smaller hook and B, ch 2.
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 3 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 20 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around.
Rep last rnd 9 times more. Break B, join A.
Next rnd: With A, ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 3 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sts.
Next rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Rep last rnd until Arm measures approx 6" [15 cm] from beg. Fasten off.
Stuff Arms lightly. Sew Arms to either side of Body.
Legs (make 2)
With smaller hook and B, ch 2.
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in first sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 24 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Rep last rnd 9 times more. Break B, join A.
Next rnd: With A, ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 4 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 20 sts.
Next 10 rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Next rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 3 sc. *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Join with sl st to first sc. 16 sts.
Next 10 rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join with sl st to first sc.
Fasten off.
Stuff Legs lightly.
Sew Legs to bottom of Body.
Tail
With 2 strands of A held tog and larger hook, ch 20. Join with sl st to first ch.
1st rnd: Ch 2 (counts as hdc). 1 hdc in each ch around. Join with sl st to top of ch 2. 20 hdc.
2nd rnd: Ch 2 (counts as hdc). 1 hdc in each hdc around. Join with sl st to top of ch 2.
Rep last rnd until Tail from beg measures approx 4” [10 cm]. Break A. Join 1 strand of D.
Next rnd: With D, ch 2 (counts as hdc). 1 hdc in each hdc around. Join with sl st to top of ch 2.
Next rnd: Ch 2 (counts as hdc). 1 hdc in each of next 2 hdc. Hdc2tog. *1 hdc in each of next 3 hdc. Hdc2tog. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to top of ch 2. 16 sts.
Next rnd: Ch 2 (counts as hdc). 1 hdc in next hdc. Hdc2tog. *1 hdc in each of next 2 hdc. Hdc2tog. Rep from * around. Join with sl st to top of ch 2. 12 sts.
Next rnd: Ch 2 (counts as hdc). *Hdc2tog. 1 hdc in next hdc. Rep from * to last 2 sts. Hdc2tog. Join with sl st to top of ch 2. 8 sts.
Next rnd: (Hdc2tog) 4 times. 4 sts. Fasten off, leaving a long end.
Draw end tightly through rem loops. Fasten securely.
Necktie
With C and smaller hook, ch 6.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Turn. 5 sc.
2nd to 7th rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
8th row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Turn. 7 sc.
9th row: As 8th row. 9 sc.
10th to 14th rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
15th, 16th and 17th rows: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sc. Sc2tog. Turn. 3 sts rem.
18th row: Ch 1. Sc3tog. Fasten off.
Tie ‘Knot’
With C and smaller hook, ch 7.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Turn. 6 sc.
2nd to 13th rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Fasten off. Sew last row and foundation row tog. Place Tie into loop of Tie ‘knot’ and sew in position.
Attach Tie to front of Body as shown in picture.

materials: Bernat® Baby Velvet™ (10.5 oz/300 g; 492 yds/450 m) Main Color (MC) Potpourri (86029) 1 ball
Size U.S. D/3 (3.25 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Susan Bates® split-lock stitch count markers.
Small amount of black worsted weight yarn for embroidery.
abbreviations: Sc2(3)tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2(3) stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
measurements: Approx 10" x [25.5 cm] tall x 9" [23 cm] diameter, excluding limbs.
instructions:
Notes:
• Stuﬃng is worked in a continuous spiral. Do not join at end of rnds. Place marker on /f_i rst st of rnd and move marker each rnd to keep place.
• To change colors, work to last 2 loops on hook and draw new color through last 2 loops and proceed.
BODY
With MC, ch 2.
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook, placing marker on /f_i rst st for beg of rnd. Do not join. 8 sc.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in each sc around. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
4th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 32 sc.
5th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 40 sc.
6th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 48 sc.
7th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 56 sc.
8th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 64 sc.
9th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Rep from * around. 72 sc.
10th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
11th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. 80 sc.
12th rnd: *2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 9 sc. Rep from * around. 88 sc.
13th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
14th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 5 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 96 sc.
15th rnd: *2 sc in /f_i rst sc. 1 sc in each of next 11 sc. Rep from * around. 104 sc.
16th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
17th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 6 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. Rep from * around. 112 sc.
18th rnd: *2 sc in /f_i rst sc. 1 sc in each of next 13 sc. Rep from * around. 120 sc.
19th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around. Place 2nd marker at end of rnd – do not move 2nd marker each rnd.
Rep last rnd until work from 2nd marker measures 4" [10 cm].
Shape top as follows:
1st rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 13 sc. Rep from * around. 112 sc.
2nd to 4th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
5th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Rep from * around. 104 sc.
6th to 8th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
9th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 11 sc. Rep from * around. 96 sc.
10th and 11th rnds: 1 sc in each sc around.
12th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. Rep from * around. 88 sc.
13th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
14th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 9 sc. Rep from * around. 80 sc.
15th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
16th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * around. 72 sc.
17th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
18th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Rep from * around. 64 sc.
19th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
20th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 56 sc.
21st rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
22nd rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Rep from * around. 48 sc.
23rd rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
24th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 40 sc.
Insert safety eyes. Stuff Body and Head.
25th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
26th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Rep from * around. 32 sc.
27th rnd: *1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
28th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 16 sc.
29th rnd: *Sc2tog. Rep from * around. 8 sc. Fasten oﬀ leaving a long end. Thread end through rem sts and fasten securely.
EARS (make 4).
With MC, ch 10.
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. 9 sc. Turn.
2nd and alt rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
3rd row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Sc2tog. 7 sc. Turn.
4th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog. 5 sc. Turn.
5th row: Ch 1. Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog. 3 sc. Turn.
6th row: Ch 1. Sc3tog. Fasten oﬀ .
Join Ears: Hold 2 Ears tog with WS facing each other. Join MC with sl st through both thicknesses to bottom right corner of Ears.
1st row: (RS). Ch 1. Working through both thicknesses, work 8 sc evenly up right side of Ear to corner. 3 sc in corner. Work 8 sc evenly down left side of Ear. Fasten oﬀ .
SNOUT
With MC, ch 5. Working in spiral as given for Body, proceed as follows:
1st rnd: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 3 sc in last ch. Working across opposite side of foundation ch, 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 2 sc in last ch. 10 sc.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in /f_i rst sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in each of next 3 sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in each of last 2 sc. 16 sc.
3rd rnd: 1 sc in /f_i rst sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. (2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc) 3 times. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. 22 sc.
4th rnd: Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around.
5th to 7th rnds: Working in both loops, 1 sc in each sc around. Fasten oﬀ .
Stuﬀ Snout lightly.
HOOVES (make 4)
With A, ch 2.
Working in spiral as for Body, proceed as follows:
1st rnd: 8 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Place marker on last st for beg of rnd. 8 sc.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in each sc around. 16 sc.
3rd rnds: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
4th rnd: *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 32 sc.
5th rnd: Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around.
6th and 7th rnds: Working in both loops, 1 sc in each sc around.
8th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
9th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around.
10th rnd: *Sc2tog. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Break A. 16 sc.
Join MC with sl st to back loop only of any sc.
11th rnd: With MC, and working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around.
12th to 15th rnds: Working in both loops, 1 sc in each sc around. Fasten oﬀ .
Stuﬀ Hoof lightly.
Create cloven hoof: Thread yarn needle with length of A. Draw yarn through center of hoof base (middle of 1st rnd) and up to top of 10th rnd (at color change). Cinch tightly to form cloven hoof. Secure ends. Repeat for each Hoof.
TAIL
With MC, ch 14.
1st row: 2 dc in 4th ch from hook. 3 dc in each ch to end of chain. Fasten oﬀ .
FINISHING
Sew Ears, Snout, Hooves and Tail to Body as seen in photo. With MC, create nostrils by making 2 tight stitches in Snout, and tacking them to Body. With black worsted weight yarn, embroider eyebrows and mouth using Stem Stitch.

materials: Lily® Sugar ’n Cream (Solids: 70.9 g/2.5 oz/109 m/120 yds)
FROG: 1 ball each of: Green (MC); Yellow (A); White (B); small amount of Black (C) for embroidery.
WHALE: 1 ball each of: Dk Blue (MC); Lt Blue (A); Black (B); small amount of Black (C) for embroidery.
Size 4 mm (U.S. G or 6) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Small amount of stuffing for Frog’s eyes.
instructions:
FROG **Body: With MC, ch 36. Join in rnd. 1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each ch around. Join with sl st in first sc. 36 sc.   2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st in first sc. Rep last rnd until work from beg measures 7 ins [18 cm]. 
Back of Head: Next row:Ch 1. 1 sc in each of next 18 sc. Tu rn .Leave rem sts unworked. 
Next row:Ch 1. Draw up a loop in each of next 2 sc. Yoh and draw through all 3 loops on hook- Sc2tog made. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. Tu r n . 
Rep last row 4 times more. 8 sts.**  
Next row:(RS). Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sts. Sc2tog over next 2 sc. Tu rn . Leave rem 4 sts unworked. 
Next row: Ch 1. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. Fasten off. 
With RS of work facing, join MC with sl st to rem 4 sts. Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sc. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. T urn. 
Next row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. Fasten off.
Chin Extension: With RS of work facing join MC with sl st to rem sts of Body and proceed as follows: 
1st row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sc. 1 sc in each of next 14 sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. T urn. 
2nd row:Ch 1. 1 sc in each st to end of row. T urn. 
3rd row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sts. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sts. Sc2tog over last 2 sts. T urn.
Rep last 2 rows twice more, omitting turning ch at end of last row. 10 sts.
Fasten off. 
Front of Head: With MC, ch 13. 
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. T urn. 12 sc. 
2nd row:Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. T urn.
Rep last row twice more. 18 sc. 
Next 8 rows:Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. T urn. 
Next row:(RS). Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sc. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. T urn. 
Rep last row 4 times more. 8 sts. 
Next row: (RS). Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sts. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. Tu rn . Leave rem 4 sts unworked.
Next row: Ch 1. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. Fasten off. 
With RS of work facing, join MC with sl st to rem 4 sts. Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sc. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. T urn. 
Next row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over next 2 sts. Fasten off.
Mouth: With A, ch 13. 
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. T urn. 12 sc. 
2nd row:Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. T urn.
Rep last row twice more. 18 sc. 
Next 8 rows:Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. T urn.
Next row:(RS). Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sc. 1 sc in each of next 14 sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. T urn. 
Next row:Ch 1. 1 sc in each st to end of row. T urn.
Next row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sts. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sts. Sc2tog over last 2 sts. T urn. 
Rep last 2 rows twice more, omitting turning ch at end of last row. 10 sts.
Fasten off. 
With WS facing each other, pin Back of Head and Front of Head matching eye shapes tog. Join MC with sl st at beg of joining row. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. Working through both thicknesses, 1 sc in each sp around to opposite side of joining row, working 3 sc at tops of eyes. Fasten off. 
With WS facing each other, pin Mouth, Front of Head and Chin Extension tog. Join MC with sl st at any point of joining row. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. Working through both thicknesses, 1 sc in each sp around joining row. Sl st in first sc. Fasten off. 
Eyes: (Make 2). With B, ch 2. 
1st rnd: 10 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st in first sc. 
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st in first sc. Fasten off. 
Sew on eyes as illustrated, placing stuffing inside, as you sew. With C, embroider eyes and nostrils. 
WHALE Work from ** to ** as given for Frog. Fasten off. 
Chin Extension: With RS of work facing join MC with sl st to rem sts of Body and proceed as follows: 1st row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sc. 1 sc in each of next 14 sc. Sc2tog  over last 2 sc. T urn. 
2nd and 3rd rows:Ch 1. 1 sc in each st to end of row. T urn. 
4th row:Ch 1. Sc2tog over first 2 sts. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sts. Sc2tog over last 2 sts. T urn. 
Rep last 3 rows once more, then 2nd and 3rd rows once, omitting turning ch at end of last row. 12 sts. Fasten off. 
Front of Head: With MC, ch 13. 
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. T urn. 12 sc. 
2nd row:2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Ch 1. T urn.
Rep last row twice more. 18 sc. 
Next 8 rows:1 sc in each sc to end of row. Ch 1. T urn. 
Next 5 rows: Sc2tog over first 2 sc. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. Ch 1. T urn. 8 sts. Omit turning ch at end of last row. Fasten off.
Mouth: With A, ch 13. 
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Ch 1. T urn. 12 sc. 
2nd row:2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. Ch 1. T urn.
Rep last row twice more. 18 sc. 
Next 8 rows:1 sc in each sc to end of row. Ch 1. T urn. 
Next row:Sc2tog over first 2 sc. 1 sc in each of next 14 sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. Ch 1. T urn. 
Next 2 rows:1 sc in each st to end of row. Ch 1. T urn. 
Next row:Sc2tog over first 2 sts. 1 sc in each sc to last 2 sts. Sc2tog over last 2 sts. Ch 1. T urn. 
Rep last 3 rows once more. 12 sts.
Next 2 rows:1 sc in each st to end of row. Ch 1. T urn, omitting turning ch at end of last row. Fasten off. 
With WS facing each other, pin Back of Head and Front head matching top of head. Join MC with sl st at beg of joining row. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. Working through both thicknesses, 1 sc in each sp alongjoining row. Fasten off.
With WS facing each other, pin Mouth, Front of Head and Chin Extension tog. Join MC with sl st at any point of joining row. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. Working through both thicknesses, 1 sc in each sp around to opposite side of joining row. Sl st in first sc. Fasten off. 
With B, embroider eyes as shown in picture.

materials: Lily® Sugar'n Cream® (2.5 oz /70.9 oz; 120 yds/109 m)
Contrast A Country Yellow (01612) 1 ball or 220 yds/205 m
Contrast B Country Green (01222) 2 balls or 130 yds/120 m
Contrast C Black (00002) 1 ball or 18 yds/15 m
Contrast D White (00001) 1 ball or 18 yds/15 m
Size U.S. G/6 (4 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge
abbreviations: Dc2(3)tog = (Yoh and draw up a loop. Yoh and draw through 2 loops on hook) in each of next 2(3) stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
Hdc2tog = (Yoh and draw up a loop. Yoh and draw through 2 loops on hook) in each of next 2(3) stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all 3 loops on hook.
Scbp = Insert hook from back to front to back around post of sc. Yoh and draw through 2 loops on hook.
instructions:
TOP SHELL
Hexagons (make 7)
With A, ch 2.
1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc. 12 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in same sp as last sl st. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) 5 times. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 18 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. (Ch 2. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc) 5 times. Ch 2. Join with sl st to first sc. Break A.
5th rnd: Join B with sl st to any ch-2 sp. Ch 1. 3 sc in same sp. (1 sc in each sc to next ch-2 sp. 3 sc in next ch-2 sp) 5 times. 1 sc in each of last 3 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten off.
Join Hexagons as shown in Diagram as follows:
Place RS of Hexagons tog. Working into back loops only through both thicknesses, join B with sl st through corresponding corner sc. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in each of next 6 sc to next corner. Rep from * as needed to join Hexagons.
Edging: (RS). Working into back loops only, join B with sl st in marked sc as shown on diagram. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. *1 hdc in each of next 2 sc. 1 dc in next sc. Dc3tog over next sc, joining sp and next sc of next Hexagon. 1 dc in next sc. 1 hdc in each of next 2 sc.** 1 sc in each of next 9 sc. Rep from * 4 times more, then rep from * to ** once. 1 sc in each of last 6 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten off.

BELLY
With A, ch 5.
1st rnd: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 3 sc in last ch. Working in opposite side of ch, 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 2 sc in last ch. Join with sl st to first sc. 10 sc.
Note: Work all following rows into back loops only.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 3 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 14 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 18 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc.* 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Rep from * to * once more. Join with sl st to first sc. 26 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc.* 1 sc in each of next 8 sc. Rep from * to * once more. 1 sc in each of last 2 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 34 sc.
6th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc.* 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Rep from * to * once more. 1 sc in each of last 4 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 42 sc.
7th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 9 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc.* 1 sc in each of next 16 sc. Rep from * to * once more. 1 sc in each of last 6 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 50 sc.
8th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 11 sc. *(3 sc in next sc. 1 sc in next sc) twice. 3 sc in next sc.* 1 sc in each of next 20 sc. Rep from * to * once more. 1 sc in each of last 8 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 62 sc.
9th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in each of next 9 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last sc. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 68 sc.
10th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 5 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. Rep from * to last 7 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of last 6 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 74 sc.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in each of next 11 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last sc. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 80 sc.
12th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Rep from * to last 8 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of last 7 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 86 sc.
13th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in each of next 13 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last sc. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 92 sc.
14th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 14 sc. Rep from * to last 9 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of last 8 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 98 sc. Fasten off.

HEAD
**With B, ch 18. Join with sl st to first ch to form a ring, taking care not to twist ch.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in first ch. *Ch 1. Skip next ch. 1 sc in next ch. Rep from * to last ch. Ch 1. Skip last ch. Join A with sl st to first sc. 18 sts.
2nd rnd: With A, sl st in next ch-1 sp. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *Ch 1. Skip next sc. 1 sc in next ch-1 sp. Rep from * to last sc. Ch 1. Skip last sc. Join B with sl st to first sc.**
3rd rnd: With B, sl st in next ch-1 sp. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *(Ch 1. Skip next sc. 1 sc in next ch-1 sp) twice. Ch 1. Skip next sc. (1 sc. Ch 1. 1 sc) all in next ch-1 sp. Rep from * once more. (Ch 1. Skip next sc. 1 sc in next ch-1 sp) twice. Ch 1. Skip last sc. Join A with sl st to first sc. 22 sts. Break B.
4th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in next ch-1 sp. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around, ending with 1 sc in last ch-1 sp. Join with sl st to first sc.
6th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. (2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 9 sc) twice. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 24 sc.
7th and 8th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
9th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. (2 sc in next sc) twice. 1 sc in each of last 11 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 26 sc.
10th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in each of last 11 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 28 sc. Fasten off.
Top of Head: 1st row: (RS). Skip first 5 sc. Join A with sl st to next sc. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 1 hdc in each of next 2 sc. 1 dc in each of next 8 sc. 1 hdc in each of next 2 sc. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Turn. Place marker on next unworked st and leave rem sts unworked.
2nd row: Ch 1. Sl st in first sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sts. Hdc2tog. 1 dc in each of next 8 sts. Hdc2tog. 1 sc in each of next 2 sts. Sl st in next st. Turn.
3rd row: Ch 1. Skip first sl st. Sl st in next sc. 1 sc in next st. 1 hdc in next st. Dc2tog. 1 dc in each of next 4 sts. Dc2tog. 1 hdc in next st. 1 sc in next st. Sl st in next st. Fasten off.
Lower Mouth: 1st row: (RS). Join A with sl st to marked sc. 1 sc in next sc (beside marked sc). 1 sc in each of next 7 sc. Sl st in last sc. Turn.
2nd row: Ch 1. Skip first sl st. Sl st in next sc. 1 sc in next sc. 1 hdc in each of next 4 sc. 1 sc in next sc. Sl st in next sc. Fasten off.
Inner Mouth: 1st rnd: (RS). Working in back loops only, join C with sl st in corner of Lower Mouth. Ch 1. Work 10 sc across Lower Mouth, then work 14 sc across Top of Head. Join with sl st to first sc. 24 sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. Sc2tog over same sc as last sl st and next sc. 1 hdc in each of next 6 sc. (Sc2tog) twice. 1 hdc in next sc. Hdc2tog. 1 dc in each of next 4 sc. Hdc2tog. 1 hdc in next sc. Sc2tog over last 2 sc. Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten off leaving a long end. Push end to inside of Head.
Turn Head inside out. Using end, join sides on Inner Mouth with 1 row of sl st. Fasten off. Turn Head right-side out. Stuff Head.
Eyes (make 2)
With C, ch 2.
1st rnd: 5 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten off.
With C, embroider pupil with straight st. 
Tail
Work from ** to ** as given for Head.
3rd rnd: With B, as 2nd rnd.
4th to 7th rnds: As 2nd and 3rd rnds twice more.
8th rnd: With A, sl st in next ch-1 sp. Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *Ch 1. Skip next sc. Sc2tog over next 2 ch-1 sps. (Ch 1. Skip next sc. 1 sc in next ch-1 sp) twice. Rep from * once more. Ch 1. Skip next sc. 1 sc in next ch-1 sp. Ch 1. Skip last sc. Join B with sl st to first sc. 14 sts. Break A.
9th rnd: With B, as 2nd rnd. 
10th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in next ch-1 sp. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around, ending with 1 sc in last ch-1 sp. Join with sl st to first sc.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. (1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog) twice. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 12 sts.
12th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
13th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. (1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog) twice. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 10 sts.
14th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. (Sc2tog) 4 times. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 6 sts.
15th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. (Sc2tog) twice. 1 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 4 sts. Fasten off leaving a long end. Draw end tightly through rem sts. Stuff Tail.
Flipper Legs (make 4)
Work from ** to ** as given for Head.
3rd rnd: With B, as 2nd rnd. Break B.
4th rnd: As 2nd rnd.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. *1 sc in next ch-1 sp. 1 sc in next sc. Rep from * around, ending with 1 sc in last ch-1 sp. Join with sl st to first sc.
6th and 7th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each sc around. Join with sl st to first sc.
8th to 13th rnds: Ch 1. 2 sc in same sp as last sl st. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. (Sc2tog) twice. 1 sc in each of next 6 sc. 2 sc in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 18 sts. Fasten off at end of 13th rnd leaving a long end.
Turn Leg inside out. Using end, fold Leg flat and join sides on with 1 row of sl st. Fasten off. Turn Leg right-side out. Stuff Leg.
FINISHING
Sew Eyes in position. Sew Belly to Top Shell with an overlap of approx ½" [1 cm] around Shell edge and leaving an opening to insert stuffing. Stuff and sew opening closed. Sew Flipper Legs, Head and Tail in position.

materials: STITCH NATION by Debbie Stoller™ “Full o’ Sheep™”: 1 ball each 2510 Aquamarine A, 2260 Clementine B, and 2205 Little Lamb C.
abbreviations: Dec (decrease) = draw up a loop in next 2 sc, yarn over and draw through all 3 loops on hook.
gauge: 18 sts = 4”; 20 rounds = 4” in sc. CHECK YOUR GAUGE. Use any size hook to obtain the gauge.
instructions:
Note: Work in continuous rounds without joining. Place marker in last st of round; move marker up each round.
ELMER
Ears (Make 2) 
Round 1: With B, ch 2; 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook.
Round 2: [Inc, sc in next sc] 3 times – 9 sc. 
Rounds 3 and 5: Sc in each sc around. 
Round 4: [Inc, sc in next 2 sc] 3 times – 12 sc.
Round 6: [Inc, sc in next 3 sc] 3 times – 15 sc. 
Round 7: [Inc, sc in next 4 sc] 3 times – 18 sc. 
Round 8: [Inc, sc in next 5 sc] 3 times – 21 sc. 
Rounds 9-11: Sc in each sc around. 
Round 12: [Dec, sc in next 5 sc] 3 times – 18 sc. 
Round 13: [Dec, sc in next 4 sc] 3 times – 15 sc. 
Round 14: [Dec, sc in next 3 sc] 3 times – 12 sc. Fasten off, leaving a tail for sewing. 
Head
Round 1: With C, ch 2; 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook.
